description: Spearheaded the digital transformation initiative, leading a team of 12+ engineers in migrating legacy monolithic applications to microservices architecture. Established coding standards, architectural patterns, and mentored junior developers while ensuring delivery of high-quality enterprise solutions.
achievements: Led migration of 5+ enterprise applications to microservices, reducing system downtime by 80%
Mentored 12+ engineers and conducted technical training sessions
Established workflows reducing deployment time from 4 hours to 30 minutes
Architected scalable solutions
Improved code quality by implementing automated testing, increasing coverage to 95%
Periodic Code reviews and knowledge sharing sessions
Introduced Git-based workflow and code review processes improving code quality
Conducted and participated in technical interviews
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define project requirements and deliverables
Optimized application performance, resulting in a 40% reduction in response times
Implemented containerization using Docker and Kubernetes, enhancing deployment flexibility
Adopted front-end frameworks like Angular, React and Vue to improve user experience
Conducted regular performance reviews and provided constructive feedback to team members
Managed deployment and maintenance of production systems with high sensitivity on uptime and reliability
Collaborated with DevOps team to setup monitoring and logging infrastructure
Developed comprehensive API documentation and developer guidelines
Stayed updated with emerging technologies and industry trends to drive innovation within the team
Certified in Generative and Prompt Engineering Fundamentals in internal Infosys certification program

Certified in various Microsoft Certifications: Azure Fundamentals (AZ-900), Azure Developer Associate (AZ-204), DP-900: Microsoft Azure Data Fundamentals and SC-900: Microsoft Security, Compliance, and Identity Fundamentals

description: Contributed as part of the core team in developing a Pharma Admin portal for a pharmaceutical client. The application helped pharmaceutical companies increase production by tracking and managing inventory, orders, and distribution processes based on the demand for medical supplies across various regions.
achievements: Participated in requirement analysis and system design discussions with clients
Developed key modules for analytics and reporting functionalities
Optimized database queries reducing query execution time by 45%
Collaborated with DevOps team to setup monitoring and logging infrastructure
Delivered sprint commitments on time with high code quality.

description: Worked as part of an agile team to design and develop scalable web application with intelligent insights for medical industry clients. Focused on building robust backend services and APIs while ensuring seamless integration with front-end components.
achievements: Designed and developed RESTful APIs for data processing and analysis.
Implemented analytical tool with help of NLP to derive insights from doctor inputs.
Integrated various charts to visualize data effectively.
Created logics for data extraction and transformation using SSIS.
Implemented various repoorts using stored procedures and SSRS for data analysis.
Mentored 4 junior developers on .NET and cloud development best practices
Proactive team collaboration for smooth functioning of project.

description: Developed and deployed various web applications for various clients. Wore multiple hats in development and operations, gaining comprehensive understanding of full software development lifecycle from design to deployment and maintenance.
achievements: Participated in requirement analysis and system design discussions with clients
Developed and maintained web applications using .NET technologies
Optimized application performance, resulting in a 25% reduction in load times
Developed Custom Build Dynamic CRM solutions with VoIP call integration for internal BPO processes. Currently using 600+ users across various departments and clients.
Managed deployment and maintenance of production systems serving 10K+ users
Implemented custom build logging and monitoring tool to integrate with multiple applications
